entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:36 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -32.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 03:00 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -32.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -36.4°C
Wind: NE 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A few clouds. High minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northeast 40 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023
